list.Title: Bad Boys for Life
list.Writer: Chris Bremner (screenplay), Peter Craig (screenplay), Joe Carnahan (screenplay), Peter Craig (story), Joe Carnahan (story), George Gallo (characters)
list.Actors: Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Vanessa Hudgens, Alexander Ludwig
list.Plot: The Bad Boys Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett are back together for one last ride in the highly anticipated Bad Boys for Life.

list.Title: Birds of Prey: And the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn
list.Actors: Margot Robbie, Rosie Perez, Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Jurnee Smollett-Bell
list.Plot: After splitting with the Joker, Harley Quinn joins superheroes Black Canary, Huntress and Renee Montoya to save a young girl from an evil crime lord.

list.Title: Sonic the Hedgehog
list.Writer: Patrick Casey, Josh Miller, Yuji Naka (characters), Naoto Ohshima (characters), Hirokazu Yasuhara (characters)
list.Actors: Ben Schwartz, Tika Sumpter, Jim Carrey, James Marsden
list.Plot: After discovering a small, blue, fast hedgehog, a small-town police officer must help it defeat an evil genius who wants to do experiments on it.

list.Title: Onward
list.Writer: Dan Scanlon (screenplay by), Jason Headley (screenplay by), Keith Bunin (screenplay by)
list.Actors: Tom Holland, Chris Pratt, Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Octavia Spencer
list.Plot: Set in a suburban fantasy world, two teenage elf brothers embark on a quest to discover if there is still magic out there.

list.Title: A Quiet Place Part II
list.Writer: Scott Beck (characters), John Krasinski, Bryan Woods (characters)
list.Actors: Cillian Murphy, John Krasinski, Emily Blunt, Noah Jupe
list.Plot: Following the events at home, the Abbott family now face the terrors of the outside world. Forced to venture into the unknown, they realize the creatures that hunt by sound are not the only threats lurking beyond the sand path.

list.Title: Mulan
list.Writer: Rick Jaffa (screenplay by), Amanda Silver (screenplay by), Elizabeth Martin (screenplay by), Lauren Hynek (screenplay by)
list.Actors: Yifei Liu, Donnie Yen, Jet Li, Li Gong
list.Plot: A young Chinese maiden disguises herself as a male warrior in order to save her father. A live-action feature film based on Disney's 'Mulan.'

list.Title: No Time to Die
list.Writer: Neal Purvis, Robert Wade, Cary Joji Fukunaga, Phoebe Waller-Bridge, Neal Purvis (story by), Robert Wade (story by), Cary Joji Fukunaga (story by), Ian Fleming (based on characters created by)
list.Actors: Ana de Armas, Daniel Craig, LÃ©a Seydoux, Rami Malek
list.Plot: James Bond has left active service. His peace is short-lived when Felix Leiter, an old friend from the CIA, turns up asking for help, leading Bond onto the trail of a mysterious villain armed with dangerous new technology.

highlights.Actors: Dean-Charles Chapman, George MacKay, Daniel Mays, Colin Firth
highlights.Plot: April 6th, 1917. As a regiment assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.

highlights.Title: Joker
highlights.Writer: Todd Phillips, Scott Silver, Bob Kane (based on characters created by), Bill Finger (based on characters created by), Jerry Robinson (based on characters created by)
highlights.Actors: Joaquin Phoenix, Robert De Niro, Zazie Beetz, Frances Conroy
highlights.Plot: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.
